attributes.review: Ya know I really do enjoy this app, but I just can’t give it 5 stars because, ALL apps matter, and they ALL deserve 5 stars. It just wouldn’t be fair 😢🤷‍♀️
attributes.title: All Apps Matter!

attributes.review: He is literally a communist robot that is being controlled by the Russians! Doesn’t anyone remember the Cold War at all? When we were getting ready to be bombed and we had bomb shelters built everywhere? DUCK AND COVER! THIS MAN IS NOT A BUSINESS MAN HES A ROBOT COMMUNIST
attributes.title: AGENT ORANGE

attributes.review: This app was supposed to give me reasons to vote for him but when I got on I saw so many reasons to not vote for him heheh 👾so I was gonna vote for him but I have to feed my chair.
attributes.title: Feeding my chair

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. It is designed so poorly and it is not easy to use.
attributes.title: I used to like Trump before I opened this app

attributes.review: Warning: this app is known to cause rant storms on Twitter. It may also be associated with the spread of a dangerous virus which has caused 135,000 deaths in the US alone. Stay safe, don’t download this app!
attributes.title: Dangerous app

attributes.review: if i could give this app 0 stars i would gladly do so ❤️❤️anyways the second i opened this app i was sent to an immediate state of agony. my eyes were met with the sight of big orange man. not a cute set up to be completely honest. everything else about it is also terrible, i don’t even need to go into detail.
Took over 6 days to download.  When it finally did it was fill of Epstein photos.  Horrible!!
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: So many spams were popping up in the app and clicks that lead you to online dark web things
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: you HAD to put in a phone number after I waited 2 days for it to download
attributes.title: Kinda sucked ngl
